exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet rt : receive_trans coh HIstep : R_inv d : dstatelet C : nat this : nid i : nat C0 : coh d /\\ I d (nodes p d) pf' : this \\in nodes p d m : TaggedMessage H : this \\in dom (dstate d) H0 : find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := C; to := this; active := true |} H1 : msg_wf rt (proj1 C0) this C m H2 : tag m = t_rcv rt Unable to unify "Type" with "coh {| dstate := upd this (receive_step rt C m (proj1 C0) pf') (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |}".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
d0: dstatelet
rt: receive_trans coh
HIstep: R_inv

Goal:
r_step_coh_t (fun (d : dstatelet) (C : CohI d) => msg_wf rt (proj1 C)) (t_rcv rt) receive_stepI

Premises:
CohI = CohPred (CohPredMixin cohIVd cohIVs cohIDom) : Coherence.cohpred (nodes p)
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
receive_trans : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> Type
proj1 : forall A B : Prop, A /\ B -> A
t_rcv : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> nat
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
nid = nat : Set
receive_stepI = fun (this from : nid) (m : seq nat) (d : dstatelet) (C : CohI d) => [eta receive_step rt from m (proj1 C)] : receive_step_t CohI Expanded type for implicit arguments receive_stepI : forall this : nid, nid -> seq nat -> forall d : dstatelet, CohI d -> this \in nodes p d -> heap Arguments receive_stepI [this] _ _ [d]
ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Transitions.ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Record receive_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := ReceiveTrans { t_rcv : nat; msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool; receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh; r_step_coh : Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step } Arguments Transitions.receive_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.ReceiveTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_rcv]%nat_scope [msg_wf]%function_scope [receive_step]
R_inv = forall (d : dstatelet) (from : nat) (this : nid) (i : mid) (C : coh d) (m : TaggedMessage) (pf : this \in nodes p d), I d (nodes p d) -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> this \in dom (dstate d) -> msg_wf rt C this from m -> tag m = t_rcv rt ->...-> I {| dstate := upd this (receive_step rt from m C pf) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} (nodes p {| dstate := upd this (receive_step rt from m C pf) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |}) : Prop
send_safeI = fun (st : send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat) => send_safe st this to d m /\ I d (nodes p d) : send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments send_safeI _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
s_safe_cohI : forall (st : send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safeI st this to d m -> CohI d
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
Protocols.rcv_tags = fun (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) => [eta map (t_rcv (coh:=coh))] : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), seq (receive_trans coh) -> seq nat Arguments Protocols.rcv_tags {nodes}%function_scope {coh} _%seq_scope
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
cohpred_PredType = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => mkPredType (Coherence.sort (nodes:=nodes)) : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> PredType dstatelet Arguments cohpred_PredType _%function_scope
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
Transitions.s_safe_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> coh d
s_safe_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> coh d
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
rcv_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags ([::] : seq (receive_trans coh))) Arguments rcv_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}

```coq
unfold receive_stepI. unfold ReceiveTrans in HIstep.
intro d. intro C. unfold receive_trans in HIstep. 
rewrite <- HIstep. unfold receive_stepI. unfold ReceiveTrans.
repeat rewrite <- HIstep.
apply receive_trans. assumption.
assumption.
Qed.```

original: unfold receive_stepI. unfold ReceiveTrans in HIstep. intro d. intro C. unfold receive_trans in HIstep. rewrite <- HIstep. unfold receive_stepI. unfold ReceiveTrans. repeat rewrite <- HIstep. apply receive_trans. auto. auto.
